job_title: Digital Marketing Executive in Enfield, England
pros: Good people, give you an opportunity to work at excellent venues
cons: Management not great, pressured, resources limited

review_title: A company who's values are more than just words
pros:
Vibrant's values are listed as friendly, professional, creative, commercial and exceptional. 

I've only been with them for a short time, but these values are obviously important to them.

The work place is incredible friendly, whether working at head office or on one of the many visitor destinations they manage. Everyone is welcoming and happy to give you their time.

Although there is a fun and relaxed working environment, our clients and visitors are held in high regard and professionalism is expected in everything we do.

Creativity is encouraged - whether coming up with new ideas on how to market our venues, or simply working with autonomy to finish tasks without micro-management.

Their commercial approach means that we finish tasks and analyse our results to be even better next time. I have worked for previous charitable companies who struggle to complete projects because of a lack of commercial drive, this was my main reason for seeking employment elsewhere - Vibrant are fast paced but collaborative.

Exceptional - I have not been here long enough to see this value in reality, but in our monthly team meetings we review statistics which demonstrate growing visitor numbers, improved experiences and real engagement from staff across the organisation
cons: None that I have seen (other than sometimes disruptive M25 travel to and from my place of work)

review_title: An exciting company to work for because of its ambitious vision.

Good Pay, Nice environment, Friendly atmosphere
